Title: Episode Eight
Plot: A fake medium with a superpower brings faces from the young offenders' past back to life, including Tony and Sally, the probation workers they killed. The gang soon realises the resurrected corpses have returned to the land of the living with dangerous motives in mind ? but then face another threat when Simon senses his destiny as Superhoodie is fast approaching.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
